item.text: I am actively seeking a full-time remote senior-level position in UI/UX design and/or front-end development. Reach out to me at 215-421-4627 or hire@nicholasdavis.com to discuss opportunities.
Next, build an angular app using Apollo Angular Client and Graphql (due date: Feb 20th 2024).
Provide more designs and code examples (due date: Feb 28th 2024).
